timeline.message:
fix: Use ArrayList while creating ListDataProvider from items array (#9197)

Wrapped the result of `Arrays.asList(T... items)` by `java.util.ArrayList` to support further add/remove operations through the DataView API without getting an UnsupportedOperationException.

Fixes #8761

(cherry picked from commit c4c4ec9cc960927f393280abe7341682d1acd8e2)

fix: hide loading indicator when endpoint call fails (#9380)

(cherry picked from commit 676f7529f1eafeb188d3cf3bb87be86ea7722af6)

fix: increase threshold for performance test (#9381)

(cherry picked from commit 529f7111729fe68c3c3190d12b22e3d41fcb84b6)

feat: tree-shakeable ES imports for TS form validators (#9374)

- Use tree-shakeable ES imports for TS form validators based on the latest version of validators lib.
- Add missing `return` in the `submit()` method

(cherry picked from commit 6608604b94af4f11013463dfdcf9521681ddb4e0)

fix: support Range requests with either start or end byte index omitted (#9368)

Supports headers of the type Range: -123 and Range: 123-.

Fixes #9083.

(cherry picked from commit ff28dd041ce8f477b4a0734c37540cec71ea524d)

chore: do not depend on commons.lang3 (#9271)

(cherry picked from commit 427ca7840cb2ec4fea44e7bb81fef22cf9d41965)

fix: Simplify check for recursive Composite::getContent() (#9180)

Using a regular instance field instead of a non-static ThreadLocal has
no functional difference except in the hypothetical case when
getContent() would be called concurrently on a different thread. That
case is not supposed to happen since the session lock should be used to
prevent concurrent access. Furthermore, concurrent invocation would
still not work properly since use of the `content` field is not
synchronized.

A simple boolean communicates the intent more clearly, thus making the
purpose of the implementation easier to understand. The simpler approach
also has a minimal positive impact on CPU usage and memory allocation.

Fixes #9160

(cherry picked from commit 51f0eda33063e00b4cdc79e97f4724159ea9a09f)

fix: Fix JavaScriptBootstrapUI::getChildren

It should return all components added to the UI, like Dialog and Notification.
Related to #7799

Fixes #9069

(cherry picked from commit bae7bce45ce8708b6a00867f7b52ea854c45eb07)

fix: check if Url contains directory change in Dev Mode (#9392)

Checks whether the Url contains a directory change and a double encoding in Dev Mode. Returns 403 Forbidden immediately and skip the request handling, if does.

(cherry picked from commit 19fe3864f9d1567c5ac7a211189986ac093e781f)

chore: remove test module test-subcontext (#9394)

This module is subsumed by test-router-custom-context.

(cherry picked from commit ea7d5c6ace26628da706bf335ec5bfef5e37df44)
